message: Let's split it 50/50 and get it over with!
You're not serious, are you? I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm taking the majority!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but don't expect me to give you everything!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. This is my final offer!
You're really trying to squeeze me out, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. This is a fair offer, take it or leave it!
You're really rubbing it in, aren't you? I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're running out of time, Alice. This is my last serious offer. Take it or face the consequences!
